mapper.sql: ( SELECT DISTINCT ttable.TABLE_NAME AS TABLE_NAME, ttable.TABLE_COMMENT AS TABLE_COMMENT, cast( ctable.ORDINAL_POSITION AS CHAR charset utf8 ) AS COLUMN_ID, ctable.COLUMN_NAME AS COLUMN_NAME, ctable.COLUMN_COMMENT AS COLUMN_COMMENT, ctable.DATA_TYPE AS COLUMN_TYPE, ( CASE WHEN ( ctable.DATA_TYPE = 'decimal' ) THEN ctable.NUMERIC_PRECISION WHEN ( ctable.DATA_TYPE LIKE '%time%' ) THEN ctable.DATETIME_PRECISION ELSE ctable.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH END ) AS COLUMN_SIZE, ctable.NUMERIC_SCALE AS COLUMN_SCALE, ctable.COLUMN_DEFAULT AS DEFAULT_VALUE, ( CASE WHEN ( ktable.CONSTRAINT_NAME = 'PRIMARY' ) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) AS PRIMARY_KEY_FLAG, ( CASE WHEN ( ctable.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' ) THEN 'on' ELSE 'off' END ) AS REQUIRED_FLAG FROM ( information_schema.TABLES ttable JOIN ( information_schema.COLUMNS ctable LEFT JOIN information_schema.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE ktable ON ( ( ( ctable.TABLE_NAME = ktable.TABLE_NAME ) AND ( ctable.COLUMN_NAME = ktable.COLUMN_NAME ) AND ( ctable.TABLE_SCHEMA = ktable.TABLE_SCHEMA ) ) ) ) ) WHERE ( ( ttable.TABLE_NAME = ctable.TABLE_NAME ) AND ( ttable.TABLE_SCHEMA = ctable.TABLE_SCHEMA ) AND ctable.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{dbUser} AND ( ttable.TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' ) ) )

SELECT DISTINCT C.CODER_ID, T.TABLE_NAME, T.TABLE_COMMENT,'0' AS CODER_FLAG, TITLE, MODEL_NAME, MODEL_NAME_CN, PACKAGE_NAME, CLASS_NAME, FUNCTION_NAME FROM
T WHERE 1=1
AND C.TITLE
${operators.title}
=
upper(#{variables.title})
AND T.TABLE_NAME
${operators.tableName}
=
upper(#{variables.tableName})
AND T.TABLE_COMMENT LIKE #{variables.tableComment}
AND ((C.CODER_ID IS NOT NULL AND '1' = #{variables.coderFlag} ) OR (C.CODER_ID IS NULL AND '0' = #{variables.coderFlag}))
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY T.TABLE_NAME

SELECT COLUMN_ID, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_COMMENT, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_COMMENT, COLUMN_TYPE, COLUMN_SIZE, COLUMN_SCALE, DEFAULT_VALUE, PRIMARY_KEY_FLAG, REQUIRED_FLAG, 'on' AS SEARCH_FLAG,'on' AS LIST_FLAG,'on' AS MODIFY_FLAG,'on' AS ADD_FLAG FROM
t WHERE t.TABLE_NAME =#{tableName} ORDER BY t.COLUMN_ID
